name: Jobify
author: Ben Marshall

sections.description:
Jobify is a lightweight & easy to use job board plugin that works with any theme — simple to setup and robust in features. Includes a powerful developer API that integrates with other sites like GitHub Jobs, Indeed, USAJOBS, Careerjet and more.

Jobify Features

Jobify is fully-featured and highly configurable. Here’s just a few of the highlights:

  • Monetize your site with the Indeed Publisher Program & Careerjet
  • Optional job post type allows you to host your own job postings
  • Customizable widget that displays the latest jobs postings from GitHub Jobs, Indeed, USAJOBS & more
  • Geolocation support to display targeted job postings
  • Developer API allows additional job portals, theme & plugin integration
  • Shortcodes to easy add jobs to any post, page or widget

In addition, Jobify features:

  • Persistent cache plugin compatibility (ex. W3 Total Cache)

Documentation

For more information and developer usage, see benmarshall.me/jobify.

If you have suggestions for a new add-on, feel free to email me at me@benmarshall.me. Want regular updates? Follow me on Twitter or visit my blog.

Languages: English

Contributors

  • Ben Marshall
sections.installation:
Plugin Installation

  1. Upload the jobify folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.4.4 (November 10, 2016)

  • Fixed issue with geolocation setting

1.4.3 (November 10, 2016)

  • Fixed issues with geolocation refreshing

1.4.2 (November 10, 2016)

  • Fixed issue with shortcode not displaying jobs

1.4.1 (October 31, 2016)

  • Updated readme
  • Misc. minor updates
  • Improved geolocation support

1.4.0 (October 31, 2016)

  • Added requirements attribute to job network API
  • Added Careerjet API
  • Fixed issue with Indeed publisher key

1.3.8 (Oct. 25, 2016)

  • Fixed non-secure image call

1.3.7 (Oct. 25, 2016)

  • Translation fix

1.3.6 (Oct. 25, 2016)

  • Added English (US) translation

1.3.5 (Oct. 25, 2016)

  • Added internationalization

1.3.4 (Oct. 25, 2016)

  • Fix PHP errors

1.3.3

  • Added Indeed publisher tracking script
  • Updated the jobify_addAPI method

1.3.2

  • Fixed bug widget

1.3.1

  • Fixed bug with geolocation
  • Added ability to add custom job shortcodes
  • Updated documentation

1.3.0

  • Updated array sent to jobify_addAPI
  • Added the [jobify] shortcode

1.2.0

  • Updated readme file & assets

1.1.0

  • Added jobify_addAPI function to allow themes and plugins to add additional job APIs.
  • Added support for Indeed.
  • Added support for USAJOBS.
  • Enabled Network site support.
  • Updated readme file.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.

Add job listings to any widget area with the highly configurable Jobify widget
